name: Star Fury
description:
Does anyone like action space games? I like them a lot, that's why I also make my own in Unreal. Mainly for the lighting and the movement controller. you can also collect a few guns and shoot down drones to relax. 

I`am currently a student at the HTK academy in Hamburg. An I do a space action game for my graduation project. It will have stealth mechanics and physics based puzzles.

The Projekt will be finished at the end of September 2022. I will Update my progress on my itch.io here every 4 weeks.

totally safe roadmap!!!

February:  Stealth Game Loop, World Lightning and block-out Finish.

March:  Enemy Master AI for easy workflow Finish

April:  Weapons  and Sound 

May: particle and FX for Explosion Sifi Stuff

June: EVA

July:  ---

August: ---

September: ---
